Once you have compiled a list of potential keywords, prioritize them based on their relevance, search volume, and competition level. Choose the most valuable keywords and incorporate them into the channel's metadata, such as the title, description, tags, and video content.

Remember to keep the target audience in mind and use language that is clear, concise, and easy to understand. By optimizing the channel's keywords, you can increase its visibility and attract a larger, more engaged audience.
